GRF_GPIO2B_IOMUX 0x00cc
GRF_GPIO2C_IOMUX 0x00d0
GRF_GPIO2D_IOMUX 0x00d4

io -4 0x200080cc
200080cc: 00005510 // 低16bit

io -4 0x200080d0
200080d4: 00000055 // 低6bit

io -4 0x200080d4
200080d4: 00000004 // 低2bit

io -4 -w 0x200080d4 0x000f0004
io -4 -w 0x200080d0 0x0fff0555
io -4 -w 0x200080cc 0xfff05510
io -4 0x200080d4
io -4 0x200080d0
io -4 0x200080cc


GPIO2_D6/I2S_SDO1_d
io -4 0x200080d4
io -4 -w 0x200080d4 0x10001000
io -4 -r 0x200080d4

io -4 -w 0x20084004 0xf000f000
io -4 -r 0x20084004

io -4 -w 0x20084000 0xf00f000
io -4 -r 0x20084000
